decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (3085/020/C, 3085/021/D, 3085/010/C, 3085/011/C, 3085/140/C, 3085/100/B, 3085/060/D, 3085/061/D, 3085/050/D,  3085/051/D, 3085/150/C, Flood Risk Assessment; Received: 06/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of single storey rear extension to ground floor flat
